text: Ra juna dina kaphiraharu narkako samu prastuta garinechan! (Bhaninecha) timile aphno asala karya sansarika jivanama nai barbada garisakyau, ra tyasabata pha'ida pani utha'isakyau, tasartha aja timila'i apamanajanaka sajaya di'inecha yo yasako danda ho ki timi dharatima anahaka ghamanda garne gardathyau ra yasakarana ki timile ajnako ullanghana gardathyau
